p: In China and the Mediterranean region, including southern France, MED is more widespread and is displacing MEAM1, probably because it has greater resistance to insecticides [ 5â€“ 6]. In the UK, B. tabaci findings are not regularly identified to biotype, but it has been noted that both MEAM1 and MED Bemisia biotypes are frequently intercepted at the border, especially on poinsettia cuttings [ 7].
